title: Wednesday Post Show (10-06-21)
itunes:title: Wednesday Post Show (10-06-21)
description:
Bobby starts talking about other celebrities who have also bought tickets to go to space. Eddie says he is ready for Hollywood after a big photo shoot yesterday. Mike D reviews the new No. 1 Netflix movie called “The Guilty” with Jake Gyllenhaal. Raymundo talks about seeing a car accident right in front of him while having brunch. Eddie now has until Monday to watch the 2nd Harry Potter movie. Eddie also talks about how he thinks people are losing their minds. We also talk about each of our followers on Instagram and how many you need to be an ‘influencer’. Bobby encourages everyone to follow @MikeDeestro on Instagram. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
